website_summaries.verdict: A smooth soy protein powder, but it's not for you if you're trying to cut down on carbs.
pros: Great value for what you get
Subtle flavor that isn't too sweet
Suitable for those with sensitive stomachs

customer_reviews.title: Finally! The best protein powder! Soy is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried several different brands/versions of protein powder and this is the best by far! It tastes great, even when only mixed with water (I mix one scoop with 20oz water). Also, lots of healthy protein! Whey tends to upset my stomach and plant based soy tastes like chemicals to me. Not to mention, some brands have a service size of TWO SCOOPS to get what one scoop of Six Star provides. This will be a regular in my diet. Only gripe...please make the package smaller.....making a huge package that is only half full when you open it? Why are so many brands doing this? Its not fooling anyone.....either fill it or make it smaller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Robair

customer_reviews.title: Used to get EAS Soy Powder; this is the best alternative
customer_reviews.text: I used to get EAS Soy Powder (Vanilla); loved it. Then it disappeared. I did a lot of research and found two options that were popular with people in the same situation: this and a weight loss powder with vitamins, but less protein. I tried both and the Six Star is definitely the best for people who prefer Soy over Whey or other protein types. The taste is close; the texture is a touch more grainy, but nothing big. It seem to digest better than the EAS, which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: George Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Too much artificial sweetener
customer_reviews.text: omb, and left a very artificial taste in my mouth. I historically have used EAS which no longer seems to be in production. Still looking for the right replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Best Texture
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting and best-mixing protein powder I've tried so far. I would have liked it better if it came in a bigger option, as milk proteins tend to bind the digestive system up and I like using soy. But I still give 5 stars because of how easily it mixes and how delicious it is. Keep in mind the weight of the product when buying. The container is certainly tall but it's only about half full when getting it. Packaging arrived right on time and showed no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kelepi Ita

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Price is good considering thr nutrients contained in this. The only bad thing i have to say about this is that, it's very moist & thick. The powder sticks to everything & the shake tastes very chalky. But its not unbearable. Just have to try & drink it as fast as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet for me.
customer_reviews.text: Liked Jarrow unflavored soy and would mix with a chocolate whey. Jarrow shot up in price so I ordered this. Rather shocked at how sweet it is. Finding it difficult to believe there is only 1/2 gram of sugar per serving.
customer_reviews.author: kerk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sauce. This stuff is great curbs my appetite and gives me more energy and everything a lot better than my other protein shake. I am now able to go to school come home and still have time and energy to work out for two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for vegetarians!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price! Since I am vegetarian, this product differently added the protein supplement I need. It works perfectly with the nutribullet smoothie regiment.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Hurry and make more !!!  This one is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Why is this unavailable!! This was the best soy protein mix I have found !!! Hurry and make more !! I get this sent every month and now I don’t see it in my orders. Waaaa!!!
customer_reviews.author: DFLO

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Uniform quality and good taste. Use it with our morning oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff mixes really well. It has a very good flavor and the ingredients are very good and mostly natural.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Useful product for “Earthquake” food supplies including soy milk.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around purchase! Delicious flavor! Makes my morning smoothies thick and creamy!
customer_reviews.author: MeMyself&Eye!

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting but does not dissolve completely so may be difficult to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Tagliaferre

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, but the plastic container is only half full
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great and it blends well into smoothies. The only annoying thing is that the container it comes in is less than half full. What a waste of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this protein exclusively for quite some time. It’s a little chalky, but for the price you honestly can’t beat it and I personally don’t mind it. Only thing I dislike is they don’t have chocolate flavored soy protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble getting enough protein because I live in a nursing home and meat basically grosses me out. A couple of times a week I eat the vegetables off my tray, then mix this up with either almond milk or water. Low sugar almond milk adds only 40 calories to it, and seems to make it thicker, tastier. It ends up being a pretty complete meal.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Turnbough

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder in flavor and curbing hunger. I blend fresh fruit, water, and the powder around 7:00 a.m. and don't think about food until after 12:00 p.m.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find soy love the product as well as the price
customer_reviews.author: Psalerno

customer_reviews.title: I like the way that it mixes
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a protein pudding instead of a shake. I like the way that it mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and it arrived quickly. Will reorder for sure. Great to mix frozen fruit, any type juice, and a scoop as a power drink after a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Scubabrat

customer_reviews.title: It is too sweet for me
customer_reviews.text: It is too sweet for me. It mixes well with soy milk and if a sweeter/smoother tasting powder is what you like, try this.
customer_reviews.author: DoFe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. I mostly use it to mix with fruits and veggies instead of just drinking it alone. But a good, rich flavor. I always mix with water and just a little milk, still a good taste
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great taste. This is my go-to protein for a vegetarian diet.
customer_reviews.text: I realize soy has some negative connotations. But as a vegetarian I find this product very appealing. This stuff mixes up really thick and tasty. I usually make it with one frozen banana, some zero calorie orange drink mix, and a scoop of soy protein. Reminds me of an Orange Julius like I used to get at the mall. Matter of fact it's so good I'd take one of these over a 600 calorie milkshake. My other favorite product is MRM Veggie Elite. I consider this a better complete plant protein, but it's also twice the cost. And, I don't think quite as good of taste.
customer_reviews.author: ProfWriter

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great. Great Reaults.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I've used this as breakfast as well as a post workout shake. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in Erie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes horrible. Even when mixed with peanut butter and milk.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney T

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for a better tasting product
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I was hoping for a better tasting product. I have to mix it with soy milk and coco power just to get it down.
customer_reviews.author: Windy G. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Mixed well. My only complaint is the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Keshad S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious milk free protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: Is great tasting and blends well in any type of smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Muffles

customer_reviews.title: This is not protein powder, each serving contains 20g ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not protein powder, each serving contains 20g soy protein AND 19g carbohydrate. This is very deceiving. Amazon should not advertise as protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but........
customer_reviews.text: This product mixes as well as any other I've tried. It also has a great taste. The only thing I don't like is all the carbohydrates it contains. I read the label before I bought it and their was no sugar but somehow this thing packs 19 grams of carbohydrates per serving.. Other products have almost no carbohydrates.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyhixson

customer_reviews.title: Only get half the container full
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and tastes great, but you'd think for a 2lb container they would fill it. The produxt container is deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass
customer_reviews.text: This stuff never quite dissolves. I guess you do get what you pay for. There is much better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like chalk. I will generally use any product even ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dissolve. Tastes like chalk. I will generally use any product even if I don't like it just to get rid of it, but with this one, I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a healthy breakfast or pick-up late morning
customer_reviews.text: I am not into marathons or heavy lifting but I do appreciate a healthy high protein breakfast-in a hurry. I have tried other protein supplements, often finding that the flavor was off putting and some times the gritty texture is prominent. This one does have a bit of the texture but I blend it with frozen fruits and almond milk. The vanilla flavor is there but subtle. Quite tasty and my 13 year old really likes it too--not usual for her.. This is my third order and I will order again unless I happen on to a better option.
customer_reviews.author: traveler GVAZ

customer_reviews.title: Buy On Sale
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be big seller and they always run out so stock up when it's ten dollars or less. It tastes good and mixes easily in drinks but sometimes I just eat half a spoonful. I don't do that often because the powder is fine and I get it down my lungs and started coughing. The product settled but I wish they pack it down at the factory instead of letting it occur during transit. The container is not even half full at the consumer end and imagine all the wasted plastic, not to mention the space it takes up in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Green Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vanilla flavor and it's so easy to mix! Each morning I shake up a small amount with almond milk and pour it on my whole grain cereal. I get the added protein and it tastes GREAT! I also put a whole serving of powder in the blender with a banana, walnuts, almond milk and crushed ice to make delicious ice-cream! I store the ice-cream in small containers in the freezer for a healthy treat. I already bought two more canisters. =)
customer_reviews.author: carolm43

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder has become a staple at my home. It blends well in most liquids and taste really good. The wife adds it to her veggie and fruit smoothies. I like to pack some in premeasured portions to mix with water in a blender ball bottle. We even add a little tiny bit to my two year olds sippy cup of milk to add some protein. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: thecaliforniakid

customer_reviews.title: Great taste soy protein with Vitamin B12
customer_reviews.text: I have been using soy protein for years for me and my elderly mom. She did not even noticed a difference on flavor or texture compared to the brand we were previouslly using that it is not sold anymore by vitamin world. I use a magic bullet to blend it. Blends great and tastes great. Vanilla flavor and no aftertaste. I do hers with milk, mine only with water and still tastes good. It is as smooth as a soy protein can be. Does not bloats my stomach as other types of proteins do.
customer_reviews.author: REDBOX MASTER

customer_reviews.title: Good but there is better out there, read my review.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, which lead me to purchase this product. It's not a bad product, but it is chalky when you drink it. GNCs Soy protein isolate is the best protein that I have tried, and we have tried at least twenty different vegan or vegetarian proteins out there. It mixes great and has no chalky texture when you drink it. I'm not promoting GNC products, this one is just the best we tried and I won't be swayed away from it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Rehrig

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein powder! I keep coming back to it! It doesn't have that synthetic sweetener flavor that many powders have. It has a slight chalky flavor/ texture, but I kind of like it lol mixes super well! Decent protein content (20 g) and def great value. It's not too sweet for 2 scoops in one shake. Great for mixing fruit into shakes.
customer_reviews.author: ashley carter

customer_reviews.title: ... the price of regular protein powders and it tastes amazing. Wish they had other flavors but this is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I am ordering this product because it is a quarter of the price of regular protein powders and it tastes amazing. Wish they had other flavors but this is good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best tasting protein powder I have come across!!! Also, the soy is so much easier on my digestive system compared to whey and I have noticed that the weight gain is not associated with the soy like I had with whey products!!! Amazing product!!!! Great price also!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki O

customer_reviews.title: Soy powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the powder for about 6 years. I mix in my orange juice each morning. Keeps me healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: VERY artificial sweetness
customer_reviews.text: I tried this one since my favorite EAS soy went discontinued. In many senses it's similar; mixes well with water, easy to cleanup shaker (just rinse then done), affordable price, and... is sweet. BUT, it's a very different, artificial sweetness. Gave me headache and couldn't even finish it. I gave a few tries, but my taste bud consistently refused this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hideaki K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great price compared to others but the taste is chalky
customer_reviews.text: I drink a smoothie every morning with fruit and soymilk with this soy protein added. It's a great price compared to others but the taste is chalky. I haven't found one that is great yet. The bulk soy protein at the health foods store is much better but hard to come by.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Samuels

customer_reviews.title: I love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder! It is delicious and gives me an extra burst of energy when I mix it with milk in the morning. It does have a slight chalky taste, but it doesn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyKatherine

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmmy
customer_reviews.text: Not gritty, or powdery has a very smooth velvet texture. Very tasty, I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Economical protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be high-quality and good value, protein grams/ cost. Tastes good, too (if that really matters in sport performance!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price per ounce is very good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that is pure soy protein this one has added taste enhancers
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT A LAUER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of protein
customer_reviews.text: Six Star soy protein provides the nutritional components I seek without upsetting my digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: I really like the vanilla
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a Soy Protein powder. Thank goodness for amazon. I really like the vanilla, chocolate has a fake chemical taste in my option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product at an amazing price. Mixes well too. I add fruit and vanilla soy milk for a delicious treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kaize

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating
customer_reviews.text: It's so sweet that it made me nauseous. I had to mix spinach in it to make it the least bit palatable, but I eventually ended up returning it, because who knows what havoc those artificial sweeteners could be playing on one's body?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Daniels

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It tends to be a bt too sweet for my taste & the calorie count is highter than others I've had but the flavor is good & mixes well in the blender
customer_reviews.author: joyspring

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. This time the package came in very beat up. The box had dents and holes in it. Was not happy to see such mistreatment.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hale Jr

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's a little grainy this vanilla flavor tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to Whey
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, whey protein makes me sick. Perhaps a lactose intolerance, I don't know. I've tried all kinds of powder as substitutes and this one really works for me and has a decent price and amount of protein. The only thing I don't like is that it is high in calories for the amount of protein. This does affect my cut a little bit, but you should be tracking calories anyways so just factor the calories in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a little sweet. I bought non-flavored soy powder which I using ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little sweet. I bought non-flavored soy powder which I using in a 50/50 mix to cut the sweetness
customer_reviews.author: Kim Muromoto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and how satisfying it was in my shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soy protein digests easy and does not seem to give me gas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, low sugar. Tastes like tapioca pudding. Have purchased more than once.
customer_reviews.author: sidewalk_surfer

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Is very flavorful. My husband loves this product. Great price and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, but there isn't much in the large container.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and will def buy more as needed. Delivery was prompt too.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: ok..but not great, taste cakie
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't very good. Doesn't mix well, the vanilla taste is ok, doesn't mix well in smoothies, all you taste is the vanilla not fruit or whatever else you mix with it. The amount of protein per serving is a little disappointing. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mcook81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: makes a really good smoothie, but the top is hard to open to big for my hands....
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: Does not blend AT ALL and it tastes like vanilla vomit
customer_reviews.author: Keneisha

product_meta.title: Six Star Pro Nutrition Elite Series Soy Protein Powder, French Vanilla Cream, 1.44 Pound (Packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Six star soy protein delivers 100% high-quality soy protein as the only protein source. Soy is an excellent vegetarian protein source that provides a complete spectrum of amino acids. This includes the essential amino acids that your body can't produce on its own and needs to take in from external sources. Plus, six star soy protein delivers 4g of fiber and is rich in vitamins B6 and B12 to support metabolic energy. Six star soy protein delivers 100% high-quality soy protein as the only protein source. Soy is an excellent vegetarian protein source that provides a complete spectrum of amino acids. This includes the essential amino acids that your body can't produce on its own and needs to take in from external sources. Plus, six star soy protein delivers 4g of fiber and is rich in vitamins B6 and B12 to support metabolic energy.
feature_bullets: Helps build lean muscle, increase strength and support recovery when used daily
Zero lactose, zero cholestero, zero trans fat and zero aspartame
